5G CBRS

Many Cable/MSO providers will complement their Wi-Fi networks with Citizens Broadband Radio Service (CBRS). By taking advantage of the shared radio spectrum, providers can utilize unlicensed 5GHz to provide better coverage, increased bandwidth, and lower latency while reducing MNO fee overhead.

Digital Experience Management: Heightening Insights and Impact at the Client Edge

Multiple business and technology advancements have combined to form a more complex and critical "edge" IT infrastructure. The movement to the edge has created a management challenge for IT organizations. While a distributed infrastructure and dispersed user/device community may offer strong gains in accessibility, productivity, safety, and affordability, they complicate the provisioning of consistent service levels and capabilities and security postures and practices.

Network Management Megatrends 2022

The summary of the 2022 edition of Enterprise Management Associates’ biennial “Network Management Megatrends” is the definitive benchmark of the state of enterprise network operations. Based on a survey of more than 400 IT organizations and one-on-one interviews with senior networking experts in Fortune 500 companies, this report should help network managers optimize operations while planning for future initiatives.
